review: I'm very pleased with the product.
author: Kimberly A Phillips

review: these is really good and i connect to 5 GZ so no lag time.
author: Amazon Customer "slim2556"

review: This would have been 5 star.  Super simple installation, pre-registred (nice touch), works as advertised,Why 2 stars?  Amazon's deceptive sales practice.  When one signs up for Amazon Prime there is no upfront warning that Prime TV cannot be received by all current TV makes and models. You are not directed or notified to first check the list of compatible Prime TVs.  So instead of Amazon asking for the TV make & model first they gladly take your $99 and you find out after the fact you cannot receive Prime TV and have no idea why.  In the case where your TV is incompatible with Prime you would think Amazon would at least offer the Fire Stick at half price.  I asked, they said no way but you can wait for a sale.  I don't like being sucked in........So the real cost for Amazon Prime (to work on my Samsung Smart TV) was $99 plus $40 for the Fire TV stick.
author: Joep42 "Retired Geek"

review: I can't really rate this item but I will leave a comment. I had to order this item twice due to the fact Amazon screwed my order up twice and had no explanation other than "this is rare, I'm sorry, we made an error". Needless to say ordering through Amazon sucked!!
author: Joey Martinez

review: It was super easy to install.  I get lots of free movies and games.  If a 72 year old grandmother can install it in less than 30 minutes, anyone can.  The picture and sound quality is very good and I have had no streaming problems. It actually works as good as my smart tv.
author: Jaded Jade

review: We purchased the firestick because of the promise of the free movies on Prime. Wow, we were so disappointed with the selection - I couldn't believe it. Well, we can still join Netflix for a reasonable price, so I guess that's a consolation. Was really hoping for something better. Sorry I can't give it a better recommendation.
author: Mare

review: Amazing and simple to use!  one drawback I noticed is that when using other apps, like Netflix, there is a delay in streaming.
author: Michael

review: Gave them to my niece and nephew for their birthdays.  Big hit!
